about_the_game:
◆ Features


A Simple Yet Deep Action-Puzzle Game!
Experience true action-puzzle gameplay with simple controls—just use the directional keys (left stick) and a single button! It's a fixed-screen, stage-clear type of action-puzzle game. A tutorial that teaches you how to play in 5 minutes is included!

・The demo includes 20 stages!
You can play 20 of the 300 stages (!) available in the full version.
The later stages offer quite a challenge!

・The full version comes with a stage editing feature!
In the full version, you can create your own stages and upload them to the Steam Workshop to let people from around the world play them.
You can also subscribe to and play stages created by other users via the Steam Workshop.

◆ Actions


Attack: Use the directional keys and the button to strike in any direction (up, down, left, or right).
Push: Hold left or right to push crystals.
Climb: Press left/right and up to climb one-step ledges.

◆ Other Features


Your best time for each stage will be recorded, and in the full version, it will be reflected in the rankings (the demo version does not include rankings).
Replays of your best time are automatically saved and can be reviewed at any time.
The game speed can be adjusted at any time during gameplay (5 levels of speed available).

◆ Story


The ancient, cursed demon palace has returned, and the souls of the people have been trapped by monsters!
But one brave girl, "Hammer-san," has appeared. With her hammer in hand, she sets out on a quest to the demon palace to free the imprisoned souls...
